argumentText:
ARGUMENT
y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | rngidm.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | rngidm.t | |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) |
| 3 |  | rngidm.u | |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` R ) = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 5 | 4, 1 | #P_mgpbas | |- B = ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 3 | #P_ringidval | |- .1. = ( 0g ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 2 | #P_mgpplusg | |- .x. = ( +g ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 2 | #P_ringideu | |- ( R e. Ring -> E! y e. B A. x e. B ( ( y .x. x ) = x /\ ( x .x. y ) = x ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_reurex | |- ( E! y e. B A. x e. B ( ( y .x. x ) = x /\ ( x .x. y ) = x ) -> E. y e. B A. x e. B ( ( y .x. x ) = x /\ ( x .x. y ) = x ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. Ring -> E. y e. B A. x e. B ( ( y .x. x ) = x /\ ( x .x. y ) = x ) ) |
| 11 | 5, 6, 7, 10 | #P_ismgmid | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( ( I e. B /\ A. x e. B ( ( I .x. x ) = x /\ ( x .x. I ) = x ) ) <-> .1. = I ) ) |
